text:
Is it possible to set *module's* attribute (like default value) using *variables*. Like:
```{% text "text_module" value="{{ Variable_Here }}" %}```

Hello folks, does anyone know where i can find the positioning for the live chat hover icon? We just turned live chat on and the icon at the footer overlays my “to the top” icon. I just need to move it a bit but cannot find the controlling CSS. Thanks for any clues
#HubSpot-messages-iframe-container is the div id that my chat widget is wrapped in.
ahhh… <https://app.slack.com/team/UK51HE2BD|@cody >many thanks… completely missed the iframe - that worked for me. Again thank you!
